messages.subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] venn diagrams
messages.msgSnippet: Someone posted a while asking ago about Venn diagrams.  I found this: http://www.venndiagram.com/ I remember loving Venn diagrams, thinking about things and
messages.messageBody:
Someone posted a while asking ago about Venn diagrams. I found this:
http://www.venndiagram.com/
I remember loving Venn diagrams, thinking about things and what they have in
common and what they don't and grouping them accordingly. Probably no surprise I
became a programmer and Venn diagramming really came in handy. In real life,
even!

Carolyn

groundhoggirl wrote:

> OH YUCK!!!! Venn Diagrams! Take them away. You just brought back to
> my mind those stupid, stupid, stupid education classes I had to take in
> order to become a certified teacher. Every time I see one of those
> things, I just want to throw up or go to sleep. Euwwwww.
